author: rickhall
msg: Add test case for a dynamic import on a package exported by a fragment
to verify that unresolved fragments can satisfy dynamic import requests.

author: tvolkert
msg: Reverted previous change to DesktopApplicationContext - it introduced a bug in JNLP deployment when the main() method is run on the event dispatch thread, in which case the WINDOW_OPENED event listener was getting notified immediately when we opened the window, but we hadn't set the application yet, so the application was never called to start-up.  In standard command-line deployment, the issue existed as a rare race condition.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MREPOSITORY-18] Scan for any files in the output directory and/or the local-repo directory with the correct finalName prefix. Then, allow users to select which ones to remove from this list; the remainder are added to the bundle along with the POM file. This is more inclusive than specifying the javadoc and sources jars alone. Also, warnings are still intact for missing javadoc/sources jars.

author: yonik
msg: SOLR-1270: make sure that plain numeric types produce correct transfer syntax for JSON, Python, Ruby, and other TextWriter fields
